values: 容易；轻松；舒适；悠闲；宽松；缓和；轻松状态；无忧无虑；不拘束；不拘谨；镇定；沉着
减轻；缓和（紧张、恐惧等）；缓解（困难、问题等）；轻松地移动；放松身体；使舒适；降低（价格、成本等）

synonym.mean: 减轻，缓和；放松；灵活地移动

word_difference_info.common_mean: 给人以帮助以减轻痛苦或悲伤

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指解除或缓解某人的病痛、担心或忧虑等，常用被动态。
较正式用词，侧重缓和或减轻别人的痛苦或悲伤。
着重以安慰减轻悲痛、愤怒或激动，使人理智地平静下来。也可指药物等减轻病痛。
普通用词，指用语言或行动对痛苦者给予鼓励、勇气和力量，从而减轻其痛苦或悲伤，得到安慰。
正式用词，指减轻身心的痛苦、不安和忧虑。
通常指在摆脱烦人、痛苦的事情，或在要求、愿望得到满足后所感到的舒适。
指因没有担心和忧虑而轻松。
专指闲暇时间或悠闲状态。
与work相对，强调水分除身心痛劳，不着重休息方式。
强调消除肌肉疲劳或思想的紧张状态，使身心松弛，得到休息。
侧重有消除痛苦、不适或困难的负担，常暗含不利因素已不存在的意味。

word_group.brief_definition: 从容不迫地；不费力地；熟练地
易于使用；易用性；方便使用
逐渐地适应；缓慢地进入
感到轻松；感到自在；感到放松
缓解紧张氛围；缓和紧张局势；缓和紧张
极其轻松；很方便；很容易

bilingual.source: The carpenter prefers to work with softwood for its ease of use.
bilingual.target: 木匠喜欢用软木，因为它容易使用。

bilingual.source: They can memorize things with more ease.
bilingual.target: 他们可以更容易地记住东西。

bilingual.source: His few possessions make him move with ease.
bilingual.target: 化东西少，使得搬家很容易。

bilingual.source: Not every idiom translates with such ease.
bilingual.target: 不是每个习语都能这样容易地译出来.

bilingual.source: Little is spent with difficulty, much with ease.
bilingual.target: 小钱花来困难，大钱花得容易。

bilingual.source: Ease translation of documents to different languages.
bilingual.target: 容易翻译文档成不同的语言。

bilingual.source: A notion that encompasses accessibility and ease of use.
bilingual.target: 这个概念同时包含易于获取和容易使用两个概念。

bilingual.source: They decide their majors and switch them with relative ease.
bilingual.target: 他们确定专业，想换专业的话也相当容易。

bilingual.source: Object initializers, which ease construction and initialization of objects.
bilingual.target: 对象构造者，使得构造和初始化对象更容易。

bilingual.source: Function to know amplitude in advance, ease of adjustment for amplitude.
bilingual.target: 具振幅预知功能且振幅调整容易。

list.abstract: 《EASE》是Troye Sivan、Broods演唱的歌曲，收录于专辑《WILD》中。

yingyinNormal.en: Officer on deck. At ease. Welcome to Dragon Army.
yingyinNormal.zh: 长官来了。稍息，欢迎来到飞龙战队。

yingyinNormal.en: Microbots can move anything, anywhere, with ease.
yingyinNormal.zh: 微型机器人，可以轻松移动任何物体至任何地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Your Majesty, if I may ease your... No, you may not.
Salaam, Alai. Salaam, Commander! Bernard. Good to see you, sir. At ease.
yingyinNormal.zh: 日安，阿莱。日安，指挥官。伯纳德。很高兴见到你，长官。稍息。

yingyinNormal.en: There's nothing like an old school safety brief to put your mind at ease.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这和以前老派的让你安心的安全简报完全不同。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, well, let me put your mind at ease. What we use it for is none of your business.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样啊，让我来放宽你心，我们拿来干什么关你们屁事。

yingyinNormal.en: Ease up on the reins there, hoss. Can't you see? He feels terrible! Hell, we all do!
yingyinNormal.zh: 别这么上火吗，老大。你没看见吗？他很难受！我们都一样。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: And you're gonna tell me to ease up on the drumming, spend more time with you because you're not feeling important.
yingyinNormal.zh: 之后你会抱怨，让我腾出更多时间来陪你，因为你会越来越没安全感。

yingyinNormal.en: If I touch someone who is sad I can ease them into contentment for a short while. I can make a stubborn person compliant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我触摸一个忧伤的人我可以短暂地缓和忧伤感 将其转化为满足感。我能让固执的人顺从。

yingyinNormal.en: No, my friend, you're not missing anything at all. I don't want you to be troubled by this. Time for me to set your mind at ease.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我的朋友，你并没有错过任何事情，我不想你被这个问题困扰，我是时候帮你把思维放松了。

yingyinNormal.en: It could also reduce cytokines, which promote inflammation, as well as boost oxytocin, a hormone that's been shown to ease anxiety.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另一个好处是降低会导致发炎的胞质分裂，并且会刺激可以降低焦虑的催产素。

yingyinNormal.en: According to Christina McCrea, an associate professor at the University of Florida, clearing up any relationship issues can often ease insomnia.
yingyinNormal.zh: 据佛罗里达大学助理教授Christina McCrea的说法，好好的处理感情问题，可以解决失眠问题。

yingyinNormal.en: I had Yondu deliver some of them to me. It broke the Ravager code, but I compensated him generously, and to ease his conscience, I said I'd never hurt them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我以前让勇度给我送来过一些孩子。虽然这坏了劫掠者的规矩，但是我给了他足够的报酬，而且为了不让他良心上过不去，我跟他说我不会伤害这些孩子。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 缓解; 减轻; 使舒适

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 从容不迫地；不费力地；熟练地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 容易地；轻松地；不费力地；无疑；远远；很快；动不动；很有可能；从容地；多半
adj. 容易的；不费力的；安逸的；舒适的；易受攻击的；无防备的；易受抨击的；水性杨花的；放荡的；从容的
n. 局促；不安；不自在；担忧
adj. 担心的；忧虑的；不安的
v. 减轻；放松；缓和；缓解；（ease的现在分词）

word_family.mean: n. 容易；不费力；自在；舒适；镇定；沉着；不拘谨；安逸；悠闲

sense_info_list.en: make something unpleasant, painful, or intense less serious or severe
sense_info_list.zh: 缓解; 减轻; 使舒适

examination_example.sentence: What they can offer does not <highlight>ease</highlight> the modern mind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们所能提供的并不能让现代人安心。

examination_example.sentence: The author holds that George Osborne’s preference stresses the necessity of <highlight>easing</highlight> the housing crisis.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者认为，乔治·奥斯本的偏好强调了缓解住房危机的必要性。

examination_example.sentence: As so often is the case, stating that principle doesn't <highlight>ease</highlight> the challenge of line-drawing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便如此规定，但也很难帮助我们做到泾渭分明，这种事情也是时有发生。

sense_info_list.en: freedom from worries or problems, especially about one's material situation

examination_example.sentence: With or without permission, they straddle laws, jurisdictions and identities with <highlight>ease</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论是否得到许可，他们都可以轻松地跨越法律、司法管辖区和身份。

word_usage.usage: ease作动词时，既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后可接名词或代词，如：ease the pain；作不及物动词时，主语多为物。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 缓解; 减轻; 舒适; 安逸

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 容易地；轻松地；不费力地；无疑；远远；很快；动不动；很有可能；从容地；多半
adj. 容易的；不费力的；安逸的；舒适的；易受攻击的；无防备的；易受抨击的；水性杨花的；放荡的；从容的
adj. 担心的；忧虑的；不安的

word_family.mean: n. 容易；不费力；自在；舒适；镇定；沉着；不拘谨；安逸；悠闲

sense_info_list.en: freedom from worries or problems, especially about one's material situation

examination_example.sentence: The need to breathe with <highlight>ease</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 需要放松地呼吸。

examination_example.sentence: They are quite at <highlight>ease</highlight> with high-tech products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对高科技产品很放心。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Ease</highlight> of care was most important; summer dresses and outfits, in particular, were chiefly cotton, readily capable of being washed and pressed at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 易于护理是最重要的; 特别是夏天的裙子和套装都主要是棉布制成的，很容易在家里洗和熨。

examination_example.sentence: It enables viewers to check the sales items with <highlight>ease</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它使观众能够轻松查看销售商品。

sense_info_list.en: make something unpleasant, painful, or intense less serious or severe
sense_info_list.zh: 缓解; 减轻; 舒适; 安逸

examination_example.sentence: It helps a great deal in <highlight>easing</highlight> traffic congestion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它对缓解交通拥挤有很大帮助。

examination_example.sentence: A time-determined revalidation would <highlight>ease</highlight> administration for everybody.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由时间决定的重新验证将减轻每个人的管理。

examination_example.sentence: Simultaneously, dramatic drops in communication costs <highlight>ease</highlight> long-distance interactions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，通讯成本的大幅下降减轻了远距离交互的难度。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指在摆脱烦人、痛苦的事情, 或在要求、愿望得到满足后所感到的舒适。
指因没有担心和忧虑而轻松。
专指闲暇时间或悠闲状态。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 容易地；轻松地；不费力地；无疑；远远；很快；动不动；很有可能；从容地；多半
adj. 容易的；不费力的；安逸的；舒适的；易受攻击的；无防备的；易受抨击的；水性杨花的；放荡的；从容的
adj. 担心的；忧虑的；不安的

word_family.mean: n. 容易；不费力；自在；舒适；镇定；沉着；不拘谨；安逸；悠闲

sense_info_list.en: make something unpleasant; painful; or intense less serious or severe
sense_info_list.zh: 缓解; 减轻; 舒适; 安逸

examination_example.sentence: Within weeks, her depression had begun to <highlight>ease</highlight> as she cycled.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几周之内，她的抑郁症随着骑自行车(这种运动)开始缓解。

examination_example.sentence: Environmental problems must be solved to <highlight>ease</highlight> the current global food shortage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 环境问题必须得到解决，以缓解目前的全球粮食短缺。

sense_info_list.en: freedom from worries or problems; especially about one's material situation

examination_example.sentence: The goal was to reach the top, accumulate wealth and retire to a life of <highlight>ease</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目标是登上顶峰，积累财富，退休回到安逸的生活。

examination_example.sentence: Who is capable of solving problems with <highlight>ease</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有能力轻松解决问题的人。

examination_example.sentence: They can memorize things with more <highlight>ease</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以更容易地记住东西。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指在摆脱烦人、痛苦的事情，或在要求、愿望得到满足后所感到的舒适。
指因没有担心和忧虑而轻松。
专指闲暇时间或悠闲状态。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 容易地；轻松地；不费力地；无疑；远远；很快；动不动；很有可能；从容地；多半
adj. 容易的；不费力的；安逸的；舒适的；易受攻击的；无防备的；易受抨击的；水性杨花的；放荡的；从容的
n. 局促；不安；不自在；担忧
adj. 担心的；忧虑的；不安的

word_family.mean: n. 容易；不费力；自在；舒适；镇定；沉着；不拘谨；安逸；悠闲

sense_info_list.en: make something unpleasant, painful, or intense less serious or severe

examination_example.sentence: It means they can say to their residents they're doing all they can to <highlight>ease</highlight> congestion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着他们可以对居民说，他们正在尽全力缓解拥堵。

examination_example.sentence: I spent eight to ten hours a day with Joe in the hospital, doing anything and everything I could to <highlight>ease</highlight> his discomfort.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我每天花八到十个小时在医院陪乔，尽我所能减轻他的不适。

sense_info_list.en: to become or help sb to become familiar with sth new, especially a new job

examination_example.sentence: Below are several tips to <highlight>ease</highlight> (使熟悉) yourself into college life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以下是几个让自己熟悉大学生活的小贴士。

指因没有担心和忧虑而轻松。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 容易地；轻松地；不费力地；无疑；远远；很快；动不动；很有可能；从容地；多半
adj. 容易的；不费力的；安逸的；舒适的；易受攻击的；无防备的；易受抨击的；水性杨花的；放荡的；从容的
adj. 担心的；忧虑的；不安的

word_family.mean: n. 容易；不费力；自在；舒适；镇定；沉着；不拘谨；安逸；悠闲

sense_info_list.en: freedom from worries or problems, especially about one's material situation

examination_example.sentence: Another problem relates to the <highlight>ease</highlight> of accessing information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一个问题涉及访问信息的难易程度。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>ease</highlight> of accessing information from the Internet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从因特网访问信息的容易性。

sense_info_list.en: make something unpleasant, painful, or intense less serious or severe
sense_info_list.zh: 缓解; 减轻; 舒适; 安逸

examination_example.sentence: The three-child policy contributes to <highlight>easing</highlight> the pressure from the aging population.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 三胎政策有助于缓解人口老龄化压力。
